Ọ malitere ọrụ nkuzi ya n'afọ 1976. N'afọ 2018, ọ hapụrụ ọrụ nkuzi iji gbaa ọsọ maka ọkwa ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.

N'afọ 2006, Bangura sonyeere ndị otu People's Movement for Democratic Change (PMDC) nke e guzobere n'ihi nkewa dị n'etiti Charles Margai na ndị na-akwado ya na Sierra Leone People's Party. O gosipụtara onwe ya dị ka onye na-akwado nsogbu ụmụ nwanyị.
N'afọ puku abụọ na iri na asatọ , ọ ghọrọ onye a họpụtara maka osote onye isi ala nke Sierra Leone ma soro onye na-azọ ọkwa onye isi ala Charles Margai na General Election.
Mgbasa ozi onye isi ala gbalịrị inweta mmeghachi omume dịka ọtụtụ ndị Sierra Leone na-ewe iwe Margai maka ịkwado Ernest Bai Koroma na All People's Congress na 2012 General Elections.
